Boulder • Cannot be mined
• Can be destroyed by explosions
Hard Boulder • Cannot be mined or blown up
Water • If you spend too much time underwater without coming up for air, you will drown
• Can be frozen
Gas • If you spend too much time in gas you will suffocate
• Gas will decay blocks above it, causing them to fall
• Gas can be blown up
Copper • Useful for updating your pickaxe and house
Tin • Useful for updating your pickaxe and house
Iron • Useful for updating your pickaxe and house
Explodium • If this comes into contact with gas or water it will explode
• If this block falls, or another block falls onto it then it will explode
• Useful for creating dynamite
Marble • Useful for upgrading your house and garden
Underground Spring • Water continuously flows from the sides and beneath this block
• Useful for upgrading your air tank
Foliage • Needs water to grow
• Can only be mined once fully grown
• Useful for upgrading your garden and air tank
Ice • Ice will freeze any adjacent water
• If you are standing in the water as it is frozen you will die
• Mining ice will produce water
Gold • Useful for upgrading your house and pickaxe
Gas Rock • Gas continuously flows from the sides and above this block
• Useful for upgrading your air tank and dynamite
Crystal • Crystals will grow when this block has adjacent ice blocks
• Can only be mined once fully grown
Costume Gem • Mining this will unlock a random costume
• Uncommon
